Allen Iverson 's still hurting Former All-Star Allen Iverson , 35, could miss the rest of the regular season and the playoffs with Turkish team Besiktas because of painful calcium deposits in his calf. He tried to tough it out and continue to play while over in Turkey, said Dr. James Andrews, who added Allen Iverson needs at least 6-8 weeks of rest. "However, he got to the point where he could not really run up and down the court." Back
